labels.analysis: The MCP Server functions as a cat fact generator, providing random trivia about cats through an API. It solves the problem of integrating engaging and entertaining content into applications or conversations by offering easy access to cat-related facts.
labels.reasoning: The primary label is chosen because the server's core functionality revolves around delivering cat facts, which aligns with the Entertainment category. It doesn't fit into other predefined categories as its purpose is purely to provide fun and informative cat trivia.

tools.name: cat_fact
tools.description: Cat Facts API'den rastgele kedi bilgisi alır.

server_info_crawled.name: Cat Facts Service
server_info_crawled.author: @ismailcan0/catfactsmcp
server_info_crawled.overview: Provide random cat facts to enrich conversations and applications with interesting feline trivia. Enhance user engagement by integrating a fun and informative cat fact generator. Easily fetch and display cat facts on demand through a simple API.

tools.name: cat_fact
tools.description: Cat Facts API'den rastgele kedi bilgisi alır.

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@ismailcan0/catfactsmcp/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
